TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JSParser extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Parses JScript code. This class belongs to the scanning and parsing category. For more information about scanning and parsing, see [Create a Language Compiler for the .NET Framework](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=110392).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.JScript.Context context) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the source code to parse.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.JScript.ScriptBlock Parse() cil managed

Docs.returns: The root of the abstract syntax tree that is created by parsing the code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The source code is specified to the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSParser.%23ctor%28Microsoft.JScript.Context%29> constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.JScript.Block ParseEvalBody() cil managed

Docs.summary: Parses the source code. Use this method instead of <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSParser.Parse%2A> when the source code is inside an method call.
Docs.returns: The root of the abstract syntax tree that is created by parsing the code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The source code is specified to the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSParser.%23ctor%28Microsoft.JScript.Context%29> constructor.
